resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Her eyes are half-closed, giving her a look of sadness.
resource.chars: Her eyes are half-closed, giving her a look of sadness.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: She has black and long hair, giving high contrast with her white clothes and the snowstorm she provokes.
resource.chars: She has black and long hair, giving high contrast with her white clothes and the snowstorm she provokes.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Her feet are never visible, giving her a ghostly appearance.
resource.chars: Her feet are never visible, giving her a ghostly appearance.
